/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/: The image presents a panoramic view of a bustling street in Beijing, China. The vantage point is high, providing a bird's eye view of the scene below. The street is teeming with life, lined with a variety of buildings that add to the urban charm of the scene. Cars of different colors are scattered along the road, indicating a busy time of day. The sky above is a clear blue, and the sun shines brightly, casting a warm glow over the entire scene. The image is captured from a low angle, adding a sense of depth and perspective to the view.
